fact_check_explanation_title: Pfizer vaccine doesn’t have a 6% fatality rate
fact_check_explanation_summary: Data on adverse events following a Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine has been misrepresented to suggest one in 17 die.

fact_check_explanation_title: Why conspiracists are linking the Omicron variant to the Illuminati
fact_check_explanation_summary: Some dubious linguistics are being used to link the extinct secret society to the new Covid-19 variant.

fact_check_explanation_title: Flucloxacillin capsules contain iron oxide which may make them magnetic
fact_check_explanation_summary: The MHRA told Full Fact that iron oxide food colouring is frequently used in the shells of capsule medication.

fact_check_explanation_title: Facebook posts falsely advertise weight loss pills as endorsed by judges on US Dragons’ Den
fact_check_explanation_summary: Weight loss pills have never featured on the US show Shark Tank, where entrepreneurs pitch their products to investors.

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson did receive his third Covid-19 vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: Multiple Facebook posts suggest, incorrectly, that Boris Johnson may not have received his Covid booster vaccine.

fact_check_explanation_title: Catching Covid-19 is not less risky than vaccination
fact_check_explanation_summary: An Instagram post makes misleading claims about the Covid-19 survival rate and side effects from the vaccines.

fact_check_explanation_title: Express vastly overstates impact of UK trade deals
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Express suggested that post-Brexit trade deals will deliver a £766 billion boost. This figure refers to the total value of trade between the UK and countries it has agreed …

fact_check_explanation_title: No available evidence that vaccines caused teen deaths
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post misleadingly suggests Covid-19 vaccines were responsible for the deaths of 10 teenagers

fact_check_explanation_title: Protecting others is a reason to wear a facemask
fact_check_explanation_summary: An important action of facemasks is their role in source control—reducing the number of particles released into the air by an infectious wearer.

fact_check_explanation_title: Video thanking Hungarian key workers doesn’t show pandemic is staged
fact_check_explanation_summary: Footage of a camera crew following three people in hazmat suits has been misinterpreted.

fact_check_explanation_title: Dissolved Omicron nanotechnology company has nothing to do with Covid-19 variant
fact_check_explanation_summary: The now-dissolved company was named after a Greek letter, like the new Covid-19 variant has been.

fact_check_explanation_title: Email asking people to pay for Omicron Covid-19 tests is a scam
fact_check_explanation_summary: There is no Omicron-specific PCR test and the NHS has confirmed the email is a scam.
